channel.title: Armored Gaming Community [317]
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/K1m19pp.gif[/img][/center] [center][b][size=12pt]Welcome to Armored Gamming Community![/size][/b][/center]
[center][b][url=http://armoredgamingco.enjin.com/forum]FORUMS[/url][/b] [center][b][url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/490lzdn67cvp43p/AGCclient.jar]PLAY NOW[/url][/b][/center] [center][b][size=12pt]Gmail:[/size] armoredgamingco@gmail.com[/b][/center] [center][b][size=12pt]Teamspeak ip:[/size] [size=12pt]armoredgaming.no-ip.biz[/size][/b][/center] [center][b][size=12pt]Skype:[/size] [size=12pt]armoredgamingco[/size][/b][/center]
[center][b][size=12pt]Armored Gaming is built for the players and their wants, Unlike other private servers Armored Gaming has a Staff Team that is working hard to make sure players have a fun, exciting gaming experience, We listen to you![/size][/b][/center]
[center][size=12pt]FEATURES:[/size][/center] [size=12pt][b]Team bossing & Single bossing
Decent EXP Rate, X2 on weekends
Near HD Graphics, Perfect Animation
Fullscreen, Resizable, Fixed playmodes to choose from!
100% Working Dwarf Cannon, Hand Cannon and other Weapons
Buying x, Using x bones on altar, smithing x bars on furnace etc
Tons of Achievements to complete with different difficulty levels so you never run out of things to do!
Zombie minigames, Tons of shops and custom items
Membership and Donation system with different advantages
Capable of receiving 15x EXP bonus if you're smart about your gameplay!
Heaps of events constantly occuring!
Active Staff members, players and Owner!
VPS Hosted, 100% uptime!
Auto Donation system, allowing you to get your items instantly!
23/25 Working Skills, Dungeoneering and Constructions Added Soon![/b][/size]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/0sNBlmF.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/lcJGI6T.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/QhmEG3i.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/WRBpydB.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/3mkxsdA.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/xtpujJr.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/8SG0t7i.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/UPE4522.png[/img]
